comment.author: 36584779@N05
comment._content: This view is looking north from roughly Avenue M, M 1/2 or N, between 13th and 14th Streets. The ruins at right are of the original Sacred Heart Church, on the NW corner of 13th and Broadway (Ave. J), and at left, the Walter Gresham Home, now known as the Bishop's Palace, at the NW corner of 14th and Broadway.
